posts.body: Publisher Humble Games and developer Crema have revealed Temtem Showdown, a new standalone battle-focused game, and it's out right now.This surprise reveal comes less than a year after the full 1.0 release of Temtem, the game that Showdown is based on. posts.title: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom Review
posts.body: Nintendo has revealed that a visually enhanced version of Luigi's Mansion: Dark Moon is coming to Switch next year. Dark Moon, otherwise known as Luigi's Mansion 2, was previously released as Nintendo 3DS-exclusive game, and its journey to Switch in 2024 marks the first time it will be playable elsewhere. posts.title: Diablo IV’s Season Of The Malignant Kicks Off July 20
posts.body: Diablo IV’s first season kicks off on July 20, and it’s called Season of the Malignant. Blizzard revealed a new trailer along with details of the content update in a livestream today.Season of the Malignant introduces a new questline set after the main campaign in which Malignant Monsters, born from Lilith’s corruption, are terrorizing Sanctuary. It’s up to you and a former priest named Cormond to locate and eradicate the source of this blight.

posts.author: Wesley LeBlanc
posts.title: NetherRealm Reveals Smoke And Rain For Mortal Kombat 1 Fighter Roster
posts.body: NetherRealm has revealed two more playable fighters joining the Mortal Kombat 1 roster: Smoke and Rain.These two returning characters were revealed as actual fighters on the roster – they still could be part of the Kameo roster, however – in a new gameplay trailer released today focused on the Lin Kuei faction. In it, we witness Scorpion and Sub-Zero's further attempts to establish this faction in Liu Kang's newly rebooted Mortal Kombat universe (hence the Mortal Kombat 1 title), where Smoke and Rain come into play.
